Interface IVideoAd

      static interface  IVideoAd.IVideoAdCreative  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getAdId()
      Returns the ad ID as specified in the VAST response.
      int getAdPosition()
      Returns the position of the ad within the pod.
      String getAdSystem()
      Returns the ad system as specified in the VAST response.
      List<IVideoAd.IVideoAdCreative> getCreatives()
      Returns all playable creatives for an advert.
      String getDescription()
      Returns the description of this ad from the VAST response.
      String getTitle()
      Returns the title of this ad from the VAST response.
      boolean isLinear()
      Indicates whether the ads current mode of operation is linear or non-linear.

      • getCreatives

        List<IVideoAd.IVideoAdCreative> getCreatives()
        Returns all playable creatives for an advert. This is commonly only one but may be more.

        returns List ofIVideoAd.IVideoAdCreative objects representing the ad content
